General.Name: Prime Impact Acquisition I
General.Description: Prime Impact Acquisition I does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. Prime Impact Acquisition I was incorporated in 2020 and is based in San Jose, California. Prime Impact Acquisition I is a subsidiary of Prime Impact Cayman, LLC.
General.Address: 123 East San Carlos Street, San Jose, CA, United States, 95112
